attributes.action: come on tour with castle AFC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the prime minister would greatly benefit from the experiance of taking a tour of amsterdam with one of england's finest football clubs. Here he could let his hair down, chill out and enjoy some light hearted banter leaving him on his return much better equiped to run the country.  It is also suggested Jonathan De Vletter is left to run the country whilst the PM is away.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
